duties_responsibilities.duty: End-to-end ownership of program scope, planning, resource management, schedule, budget, and progress against business outcomes.
Optimize the flow of value through teams, facilitate the prioritization of all work, and manage the program backlog.
Develop program metrics, monitor and report on the progress of programs to all stakeholders and project team members.
Mentor team members in agile and scrum methodologies through an agile transformation, promoting best practices and driving continuous improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field or equivalent experience. PMI-ACP, CSM, PgMP, PMP or equivalent preferred.
